sentences.en: A spice of danger affects people in different ways.
sentences.cn: 危险的处境对人的影响各不相同.

sentences.en: Diminishing marginal utility also expresses a " variety is the spice of life ".
sentences.cn: 边际效用递减也表现为一种 “ 多样化是生活乐趣 ”.

sentences.en: He is bored and needs a little spice in his life.
sentences.cn: 他对生活感到厌倦,需要点刺激.

sentences.en: Henry's worn - out joke lacks spice for anyone.
sentences.cn: 亨利的老掉牙的笑话谁听起来也乏味.

sentences.en: Her publisher wants her to spice up her stories with sex.
sentences.cn: 她的出版商想让她在小说中增添些性描写以吸引读者。

sentences.en: His jokes always give spice to his conversation.
sentences.cn: 他讲的笑话常常给他的谈话增添风趣.

sentences.en: I could spice my talk with Talmudic lore, too.
sentences.cn: 我还能够把一些犹太法典的知识融会于我的谈论之中.

sentences.en: Make deep slashes in the meat and push in the spice paste.
sentences.cn: 在肉上切出深深的口子，再把辣酱塞进切口中。

sentences.en: Spain, however, was determined to have a share in the spice trade.
sentences.cn: 然而, 西班牙决心要分享香料贸易的利益.

sentences.en: Spice your writing with funny remarks.
sentences.cn: 用些有趣的话给你的文章增添趣味.

sentences.en: The best of us have a spice of perversity in us.
sentences.cn: 在我们最出色的人身上都有任性的一面.

sentences.en: There is too much spice in the cake.
They spiced their conversations and discussions with intrigue.
sentences.cn: 他们通过设谜为他们的谈话和讨论增加乐趣。

sentences.en: This spice is used particularly in poultry feed to deepen the colour of egg yolks.
sentences.cn: 这种香料尤用于家禽的饲料中，以加深蛋黄的颜色。

sentences.en: To add spice to the debate, they disagreed about method and ideology.
sentences.cn: 他们在方法和观念上都持不同意见，这使辩论精彩了很多。

sentences.en: Variety is the spice of life!
sentences.cn: 多样化使生活更有情趣！

words.tran_cn: 辛辣的；香的，多香料的；下流的
香料；情趣；[食品]调味品；少许

phrases.tran_cn: 香料群岛（等于Moluccas，印度尼西亚东北部马鲁古群岛）
生活的调味品；使人高兴的事

trans.tran_cn: 香料，调味品，香气，香味，趣味，情趣，少许
trans.tran_en: a type of powder or seed, taken from plants, that you put into food you are cooking to give it a special taste
If you spice something that you say or do, you add excitement or interest to it
to add interest or excitement to something
